content: solig sunflower pillow pattern *****this pattern is available for free on my website at https //www nautikrallcrochet com/blog-freepatterns/soligsunflower this listing is for those who wish to have an advertisement free pattern or printable copy solig swedish sunny aptly named if i do say so myself the sunny sunflower pillow will brighten any late summer/early fall makers home i hope you all enjoy this easy and quick make can t have too many pillow am i right the pattern uses wecrochet brava worsted 100% acrylic yarn a 5mm hook and an 16 x16 washable pillow form/insert pattern includes all colours used and the yarn quantities the final pillow size was 16 x 16 square pattern will include - yarn amounts/quantities - yarn colours - stitch glossary - printable pdf of pillow graph - full written instruction for the granny square used sunflower granny square - video tutorials for the sunflower granny square as well as the continuous join as you go method - written and video tutorial for pillow cover assembly happy crocheting everyone l m
